functions.name: MXTICKER
functions.description: Returns requested compliance data fields for a stock ticker.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The names of the fields to retrieve (e.g., 'Result', 'AAOIFI').

functions.name: MXISIN
functions.description: Returns requested compliance data fields for an ISIN code.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The names of the fields to retrieve (e.g., 'FTSE', 'Zakatpershare').
